landing-page.page-main-header: The hottest __applicationName__ discussions with the biggest fans.
landing-page.download-the-app-header: Download the app to join in now!
landing-page.start-discussions-text: Ask a question, share news or just talk with other fans from around the world about your favorite topics!
landing-page.upvote-the-best-text: See something you love? Cast your upvote to show your appreciation and influence what's trending.
landing-page.share-your-knowledge-text: Share your favorite discussions with your social networks to bring more fans into the fold.

main.not-found-error: Uh oh, looks like this page doesn't exist!
main.no-replies-be-the-first: No replies yet. Be the first!
main.modal-dialog-delete-all-message: Are you sure you want to delete all posts by __userName__ on __wikiName__? Note that only individual posts can be restored and that you cannot undelete posts in bulk.
main.modal-dialog-delete-text: By deleting this post all of its contents will be removed.
main.modal-dialog-delete-reply-text: By deleting this reply all of its contents will be removed.
main.modal-dialog-approve-text: By approving this post it will no longer be flagged.
main.modal-dialog-approve-reply-text: By approving this reply it will no longer be flagged.
main.empty-forum-text: No posts yet. Get the discussion started, create the first post now!
main.reported-to-moderators-replied-to: A reply to __userName__, reported to moderators
main.locked-and-reported-to-moderators-text: This post is locked, and has been reported.
main.reported-not-found-error: There are no reported posts or replies.
main.categories-edit-max-categories-info: You have reached the limit of allowed categories (__maxCategoriesCount__).
main.categories-edit-error-empty-category: Category name requires at least one character.
main.app-promotion-text: Take your fandom with you, download the app today!
main.app-promotion-text-details-page: Stay up to date on the go. Get the app now!

editor.post-error-anon-cant-post: Sign in to join the discussion!
editor.post-error-not-authorized: You cannot post because your account has been blocked.
editor.post-editor-placeholder-text: Share a thought, question or link...
